Interface HandlerNetworkMessage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ModelViewMessage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CellModelMessage, DisconnectMessage, EnemyMessage, MapMessage, NewTurnMessage, PlayerModelMessage, PossibleCharacterMessage, PrintFromControllerMessage, RankingMessage, SkullBoardMessage, StartGameMessage, StatusLoginMessage

    public interface HandlerNetworkMessage
    Author:
    Galli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleMessage(Client client)
      Only the message itself can't know how to handle itself.

    • Method Detail

      • handleMessage

        void handleMessage(Client client)
        Only the message itself can't know how to handle itself. This method call the right method of the client which receive this message in order to handle and forward it correctly.
        Parameters:
        client - The Client object which has to handle this message
